channel.title: Can someone please help? (Server Problems)
channel.description:
Alright I have everything going great. The compiler and EVERYTHING works except the biggest thing. Getting it online. I have a no-ip account and I have looked over many tut's but this still doesnt seem to help. I already made my server ip: colescape.no-ip.info. I can log onto it though. I run the server and it works fine and the only way I can get onto my server is by using the server ip: 127.0.0.1 Ip or whatever. This really bugs me cause im so close to being done with my server. I have went into my router and potfowarded everything it still says: Error connecting to server. on any client I use. (Heck I even have a custom client)
Can someone please help me :D
I think this is in the right forum... lol :|

And nubs, no shit, i know its not my IP… I said, same router IP dooche…

item.title: Can someone please help? (Server Problems)
item.dc:creator: @adumus adumus
item.description:
@adumus wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:14, topic:217874”][quote author=Fun 4 me not u link=topic=286318.msg2317989#msg2317989 date=1215390142]
OMFG SAME THING WITH ME!!
why bother posting unless you are going to try and help me!!!
We got same problem, and same router IP lulz!!!

But, im not lucky… I CANT LOGIN :(, only using localhost

[/quote]

Thats your default gateway… Not your IP lawl.[/quote]

item.title: Can someone please help? (Server Problems)
item.dc:creator: @Zuno Zuno
item.description:
@Zuno wrote:

How would I do that? Like screenshots or soemthing?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 12:23:34 PM[/size][hr]When i type in my ip (my ip is 192.168.1.1) in the adress bar the thing comes up and I log into my router i go to applications and gaming and then it has like:

Start End Protocol IP Adress Enable
43594 to 43594 TCP 192.168.1.[100] (box checked)

on the IP Adress thing the [10] is in a box and it makes me type the last 3 numbers which is 100 and if i just type 1 which is how i get into my router it says invalid IP address.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 12:36:59 PM[/size][hr]Rofl Idk if this is a miracle or something but i can log into colescape.no-ip.info now! Thanks bunch guys! I think dunea should be a mod :). DELETE THIS TOPIC IF NEEDED.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone please help? (Server Problems)
item.dc:creator: @Rs3advanced Rs3advanced
item.description:
@Rs3advanced wrote:

[quote=“dunea, post:4, topic:217874”]check your server for your port it might be like 5555

search for this public static int serverlistenerPort =

change it to 43594 if its 5555.

edit:

Or you could’ve messed up on the colescape.no-ip.info thing…

did you even do the router thing you need to do router thing.[/quote]Hey, i got a ? following that is public static int serverlistenerPort =… what file would this be in?

Read full topic
